title: How to Make Raw Vegan Cheese
directions: Place the macadamia nuts in the blender.
Pour enough water to cover them, but not too much.
Get the blender working on high speed for 30 seconds. That’s the moment it will start warming up and we don’t want that. Stop for a while and hit the high speed for another 30 seconds…
When the nuts are all blended and puffy add the lime juice and the salt and mix again (with a spatula, not the blender).
Take a colander, place doubled mesh bag in it and pour in the cheesy cream.
Fold the bag covering all the mixture and add something heavy on top, like a plate, big cup or a small pot.

Take the setting into a warm location and leave it there for 24 hours. It will be best if you add more weight on it at some point, to drain all the water out of the cheese. Garnish with herbs & nutritional yeast. Serve with crackers, veggies and red wine.
ingredients: a dash of pink himalayan salt
